item.description:
The plan is to sign wave from both directions,
one group take the North side of Route 1 &
another group take the south side. Then
break up into pairs and work the tailgaters
with literature & DVD?s.

I have 2 4?x8? signs and we would like to
order more, which we can get 50 signs for
$350 + shipping, (custom professional high
quality) made with messages like:

1
Restore the Constitution
- Vote RonPaul2008.com
2
End the War in Iraq
3
Eliminate Income Tax
4
NO Amnesty for Illegal Aliens
5
More ideas welcome!!!

We will need to pay for these signs
through our groups.

I have a paypal account jukelsa3@yahoo.com
and could start a pool for this purchase.
Signs are $7.00 each and you will get the
signs you pay for to take and hang wherever
you like or keep around for sign waves. RI has
been active in sign making and hanging with
great results. Boston could use a sign hanging
blitz event.
We are heading into crunch time, the revolution is
growing but we need all meetup members to get
out to these events.

If you can't make this or any other event, then
the meetup requires a signed notarized affidavit
stating your lame excuse why you won't be there.

Contact: Bob Dwyer 508-930-5530 jukelas3@yahoo.com
Bob Larkin 508-813-6748 interleave1@earthlink.net
item.name: Gillette Stadium- Sunday October 7th.
